LanguageData.AutoEjected: Pawn was auto-ejected from Hemogen Extractor to prevent death from malnutrition.
LanguageData.CommandCopyHemogenExtractorSettingsDesc: Copy this Hemogen Extractor's settings to the clipboard so you can paste them onto another Hemogen Extractor.
LanguageData.CommandPasteHemogenExtractorSettingsDesc: Overwrite this Hemogen Extractor's settings with those previously copied to the clipboard.
